name: devour
content:
Add to word list

to eat something eagerly and in large amounts so that nothing is left: The young cubs hungrily devoured the deer.

literary to destroy something completely: The flames quickly devoured the building.
to read books or literature quickly and eagerly: She loves to read - she devours one book after another.
